mapper.select: SELECT v.id+10000 childId,v.cph childName,m.VehGroupID parentId FROM Vehicle v, VehicleDetail vd, ( SELECT uv.VehGroupID FROM User_VehGroup uv, VehGroupDetail vgd, VehGroupMain vm WHERE uv.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID AND uv.userId = #{userId} AND vm.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID UNION SELECT vgd.VehGroupID FROM User_VehGroup uv, VehGroupDetail vgd, VehGroupMain vm WHERE uv.VehGroupID = vgd.fVehGroupID AND uv.userId = #{userId} AND vm.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID ) m WHERE v.id = vd.VehID AND vd.VehGroupID = m.VehGroupID order by childName

SELECT uv.VehGroupID childId, vgd.fVehGroupID parentId, vm.VehGroupName childName, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM VehGroupDetail v3, VehGroupMain v4 WHERE v3.fVehGroupID = uv.VehGroupID AND v3.VehGroupID = v4.VehGroupID ) num1, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM VehicleDetail vd WHERE vd.VehGroupID = uv.VehGroupID ) num FROM User_VehGroup uv, VehGroupDetail vgd, VehGroupMain vm WHERE uv.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID AND uv.userId = #{userId} AND vm.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID UNION SELECT vgd.VehGroupID childId, uv.VehGroupID parentId, vm.VehGroupName childNamem, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM VehGroupDetail v3, VehGroupMain v4 WHERE v3.fVehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID AND v3.VehGroupID = v4.VehGroupID ) num1, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM VehicleDetail vd WHERE vd.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID ) num FROM User_VehGroup uv, VehGroupDetail vgd, VehGroupMain vm WHERE uv.VehGroupID = vgd.fVehGroupID AND uv.userId = #{userId} AND vm.VehGroupID = vgd.VehGroupID ORDER BY childName
